content:
i changed the username to that format and got this error:
 "message": "#< CLIXML\nSystem.Management.Automation.PSCustomObjectSystem.Object1Preparing modules for first use.0-1-1Completed-1 1Preparing modules for first use.0-1-1Completed-1 1Preparing modules for first use.0-1-1Completed-1 ~~Add-Computer : Cannot convert 'System.Object[]' to the type 'System.String' required by parameter 'OUPath'. Specified \_x000D\_\_x000A\_~~~~method is not supported.\_x000D\_\_x000A\_~~~~At line:3 char:48\_x000D\_\_x000A\_~~~~+ ... ame corp.nmrp.com -OUPath OU=computers,DC=corp,DC=nmrp,DC=com -Creden ...\_x000D\_\_x000A\_~~~~+~~
